import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import editTodoContainer from "../containers/editTodo.container"; const EditTodo = (props) => { console.log(props); const id = useState(props.match.params.id); console.log(id); const fetchTodo = props.fetchTodo; console.log(fetchTodo); useEffect(() => { fetchTodo(id.id); }, [fetchTodo, id]); return (

) } export default connect(editTodoContainer.mapStateToProps, editTodoContainer.mapDispatchToProps)(EditTodo);
